intro: Rondeletia odorata subsp. bullata, commonly known as the fragrant rondeletia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its showy, tubular flowers that are typically pink or red in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in tropical rainforests. The subspecies bullata is distinguished by its more robust growth and stronger fragrance compared to other forms of Rondeletia odorata.
